name: sigmatimer
description: A combined Pomodoro timer for web, desktop, and mobile.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run electron"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-electron
scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-electron
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-electron: cd app && npm install && npm run build
